channel.title: Harmonium says his password is not working
channel.description:
my friend HARMONIUM on the server's password is no longer working.
and he was probably hacked because it was easy, but anyone know how to fix this?
any mods or admins on that can help?

item.title: Harmonium says his password is not working
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Ok guys since no one reads I don’t get why I should post this.

There are problems with the database holding the password, etc so please just hold on to your butts.
